champ_0070_top_02: You just defeated the Gym Leader, yes?[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0070_top_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]And your name is [VAR TRNAME(0000)],
if I\r
recall\r
correctly...[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0070_top_04: Tell me, do you seek to become a Champion?[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0070_top_05a:
Just what I hoped to hear. You have a rare talent,
especially for your age.\c
Aim high—greater heights are within your reach.[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0070_top_05b:
Oh my, are you certain? You have a rare talent,
especially for your age.\c
It’d be a shame for that talent to go to waste.[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0070_top_06: Oh, but I’ve gotten ahead of myself.[VAR 0114(002C)]
champ_0070_top_07:
I am Geeta, chairwoman of the Pokémon League,
the organization that runs these Gyms.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0070_top_08:
As you seem to be collecting Gym Badges,
I suspect we’ll meet again down the line.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0070_top_09: Until then, good day to you.[VAR 0114(0011)]
